oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This proceedings includes papers delivered at the Aflatoxin Workshop held at CIMMYT in April, 1986. Contributed papers present background on the aflatoxin problem, studies of toxicoses, sampling and detection methods, agronomic factors related to infection, plant stress and infection, insect vectors, breeding for resistance, and other forms of control. The final section of the proceedings contains country reports that review the status of aflatoxin research and control around the world.
